required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Double-blind, Escalating Dose, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study Assessing PK, Safety, Tolerability in Non-ambulant DMD Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-blind, Escalating Dose, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess the Pharmacokinetics, Safety and Tolerability of Single Subcutaneous Injections of GSK2402968 in Non-ambulant Subjects With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is investigate the pharmacokinetics, safety and tolerability of single subcutaneous administration of GSK2402968 in non-ambulant boys with Duchenne muscular dystrophy

link.description: Results for study 114118 can be found on the GSK Clinical Study Register.
